mapper.sql: id, username, mobile, email, loginPwd, createTime
mapper.update: update user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loginPwd = #{loginPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
